snippet: A Senate hearing focused on Turing Pharmaceuticals and Valeant, which have sharply increased the prices of drugs they have acquired.
abstract: Republican and Democratic senators condemn rapid, dramatic price increases for decades-old drugs that have been made by some pharmaceutical firms recently; call them unconscionable and detrimental to patients.
lead_paragraph: A Senate hearing focused on Turing Pharmaceuticals and Valeant, which have sharply increased the prices of drugs they have acquired.

headline.main: Senators Condemn Big Price Increases for Drugs
headline.print_headline: Senators Condemn Price Rises for Drugs
